SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.handlers

Class DestructibleEntityHandler

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.handlers.DestructibleEntityHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnemyInterface
public class DestructibleEntityHandler extends Object implements EnemyInterface
Handles destructible entities in the game. Manages the creation, updating, and removal of friendly units, enemy units, projectiles, and powerups.
See Also:
